title: Add Concurrency Protection to Item Store
overview:
No concurrency protection exists in the item store, leading to potential race conditions and data corruption.

**Motivation:** Data integrity - ensures multiple simultaneous operations don't corrupt item state or cause lost updates.

**Signals:** priority: high, urgency: Top priority gap - data integrity
